items.label: Evidence Item 001
items.content: Evidence Item 001 was received at some point and we did some stuff to it.

items.label: Evidence Item 002
items.content: We burned this one as you wouldn't want it.

summaries.content: The summary of the investigation is that we did some stuff and are returning stuff to the other person to do some more stuff.

summaries.label: Disclaimer
summaries.content: We are not responsible to do stuff, and the stuff we do do, we are not responsible for either.

dispositions.content: Here at DFS, we are disposed to doing things.  We have disposed of your evidence in a timely manner with all the care that you yourself would have used.
